Freq: 9714
禖，拼音méi，是指祭名。
禖, pinyin méi, refers to the name of the sacrifice.

禖字的基本解释

禖
méi
求子的祭祀。
求子所祭的神。

禖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［méi］
［《廣韻》莫杯切，平灰，明。］
古人求子之祭。见《玉篇》。亦指求子所祭之神。

禖字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【示字部】　禖； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页845第11
【唐韻】莫桮切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】謨杯切，?音枚。天子求子祭名。【禮·月令】仲春之月，以太牢祠于高禖，天子親往，后妃率九嬪御，乃禮天子所御，帶以弓韣，授以弓矢，于高禖之前。【?㵆曰】高禖，先禖之神。高，尊之之稱。變媒言禖，神之也。○按《禮·月令》鄭康成註：娀?吞卵生契，後王以爲媒官，嘉祥而立祠，蓋以高辛爲禖神也。據孔疏云：《毛詩》傳，姜嫄從帝祠郊禖，又?狄從帝祈郊禖，是先有禖神矣，此亦足證鄭說之鑿。

禖字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
禖字的起名意思

暂无。

禖
Basic explanation of words
禖
méi
Sacrifice for the child.
Pray for the god sacrificed by the son.
禖
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［méi］
["Guangyun" Mo cup cut, flat gray, bright. ]
The sacrifice of the ancients to pray for children. See "Jade Chapter". It also refers to the god sacrificed by Qiuzi.
禖
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [Shizi Department] 　禖; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 845 11
[Tang Yun] Mo cup cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Mo cup cut,? Sound. The emperor asks for the name of the sacrifice. [Rite·Yue Order] In the month of Mid-Spring, the Tailao Temple is in Gaoxuan, the emperor will go, and the concubine will lead the nine concubines to impere the emperor. [? 㵆 Said] Gao Qi, the god of first Qi. High, the title of respect. Changing the matchmaker's words is God's also. ○According to Zheng Kangcheng's Note of "Rite·Moon Order": 娀? Swallow eggs to give birth to a contract, the queen regarded as a matchmaker, Jiaxiang set up a shrine, and built Gaoxin as a god. According to Kong Shuyun: "Mao Shi" biography, Jiang Chang from the emperor's temple, and Di Cong emperor prays for the suburbs, is the first to have the gods, this is also sufficient to prove Zheng said.
